experiences.description: Developed and maintained ETL pipelines using Python, Spark, and Hadoop to process large datasets for machine learning models. Implemented data quality checks and monitoring systems. Contributed to the design and implementation of a data warehouse solution on AWS.

Led the design and implementation of a new data pipeline architecture using Kafka and Airflow to ingest and process real-time data streams. Optimized data infrastructure for performance and scalability. Mentored junior data engineers.

Architected and implemented a scalable data warehousing solution on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) using BigQuery and Dataflow. Developed and maintained data governance policies and procedures. Led a team of data engineers to build and maintain data pipelines for various business units.

education.description: Focused on algorithms, data structures, and database management systems. Completed a research project on distributed data processing.
Specialized in machine learning, data mining, and statistical modeling. Thesis focused on developing novel techniques for anomaly detection in large datasets.
